summary: Adds many new light sources to the player home in Whiterun. Also moves a few vanilla ones, and fixes the annoying fire shadow bug.
descriptionHtml:
Adds many new light sources to the player home in Whiterun. Also moves a few vanilla ones to better places, and fixes the annoying fire shadow bug.

Expect a small frame rate drop due to extra light sources and shadows.

Should be working correctly with the \"decorate home\" quests. Have not tested that just yet though...

Please suggest a category this should be listed under!
author: DemiDekiDasu
